statements: DELETE FROM supplier_reports WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier ABC';
DELETE FROM supplier_reports WHERE lead_time_days > 5 AND delivery_performance < 0.8;
DELETE FROM SupplierLeadTimes WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND lead_time < 5
DELETE FROM DeliveryPerformance WHERE status = 'delayed' AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM lead_time_report WHERE delivery_date < '2022-01-01' AND lead_time > 5;
DELETE FROM delivery_reports WHERE supplier_id = 1001 AND delivery_date = '2022-01-10';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_id = 500 AND supplier_id = 2001;
